chats.Create a chat room and chat with your fr: Create a chat room and chat with your friends

chats.Are you sure you want to leave the chatr: Are you sure you want to leave the chatroom?
chats.If you leave, all the conversation histo: If you leave, all the conversation history will be deleted and this chatroom will be removed from the chat list.
chats.This room has users who are not register: This room has users who are not registered as friends.
chats.this user is not registered as a friend: this user is not registered as a friend.
chats.Are you sure you want to clear messages: Are you sure you want to clear messages in this chat?
chats.If you leave, all chat history will be d: If you leave, all chat history will be deleted and this chatroom will be removed from the chat list.
chats.If you leave this chat room, you cannot: If you leave this chat room, you cannot see all chat history when coming back.
chats.The chat room will be maintained even if: The chat room will be maintained even if you (owner) leave. Also, you cannot see all chat history when coming back.
chats.Are you sure you want to leave my chatro: Are you sure you want to leave my chatroom?
chats.If you leave, all chat history will be d: If you leave, all chat history will be deleted and this chatroom will be removed from your chat list.
chats.Are you sure you want to undo the edit?: Are you sure you want to undo the edit?
chats.If you delete it, all applied contents w: If you delete it, all applied contents will be deleted
chats.Please set a reason for reporting: Please set a reason for reporting.

chats.And you are no longer a member in this g: And you are no longer a member in this group
chats.Are you sure you want to delete this mes: Are you sure you want to delete this message?
chats.You can delete messages in 24 hours only: You can delete messages in 24 hours only.
chats.If you delete only for me, your friend's: If you delete only for me, your friend's chat history will remain.
chats.If you delete both friends and me, the c: If you delete both friends and me, the chat history will be deleted for you and all your friends.
chats.You can delete media in 24 hours only, f: You can delete media in 24 hours only, from the time it was shared.
chats.You have requested to log in Kok Kok PC: You have requested to log in Kok Kok PC on Lorem's MacBook Pro.
chats.If you did not request, tap Deny to igno: If you did not request, tap Deny to ignore this message
chats.You will no longer be able to see all co: You will no longer be able to see all conversation history in this chatroom.
chats.Kokkok needs access to your microphone s: Kokkok needs access to your microphone so that you can send voice messages.
chats.My mum is the best cook in the world: My mum is the best cook in the world
chats.You can't forward the message more than: You can't forward the message more than 10 friends at once.
chats.Message forwarded You can check the mess: Message forwarded. You can check the message on Chats.
chats.Speaker: Speaker
chats.Search by name or phone number or E-mail: Search by name or phone number or E-mail
chats.If you leave this chat room, you cannot: If you leave this chat room, you cannot see the chat history when coming back.
chats.The chat room will be maintained even if: The chat room will be maintained even if you (owner) leave. Also, you cannot see the chat history when coming back.
chats.Deleting a conversation after leaving a: Deleting a conversation after leaving a group
chats.You can change this setting on your syst: You can change this setting on your system preference.

setting.Enter your new E-mail to change E-mail: Enter your new E-mail to change E-mail.
setting.Enter your E-mail to register E-mail: Enter your E-mail to register E-mail.
setting.An activation code will be sent to this: An activation code will be sent to this E-mail
setting.You can change your Number here Your acc: You can change your Number here. Your account and your cloud data messages, media, contacts, etc... will be moved to the new number.
setting.You can change your E-mail here Your acc: You can change your E-mail here. Your account and your cloud data messages, media, contacts, etc... will be moved to the new E-mail.
setting.User will see your new E-mail if they ha: User will see your new E-mail if they have it in their address book or your privacy settings allow them to see it. You can modify this in Settings > Privacy and Security > E-mail number.
setting.User will see your new number if they ha: User will see your new number if they have it in their address book or your privacy settings allow them to see it. You can modify this in Settings > Privacy and Security > Phone number.
setting.Get a verified badge to make people more: Get a verified badge to make people more easily find and recognize the public figures, celebrities and brands!
setting.Please enter e-mail address to contact y: Please enter e-mail address to contact you for verification.
setting.Please enter a valid email address: Please enter a valid email address
setting.kok kok manager will contact you by e-ma: kok kok manager will contact you by e-mail and ask you for documents in needed.
setting.Get a verified badge to make people find: Get a verified badge to make people find and recognize you easier with official account.
setting.ID is not available Please enter another: ID is not available. Please enter another ID.
setting.ID must have at least 2 characters: ID must have at least 2 characters.
setting.ID cannot be used more than 40 character: ID cannot be used more than 40 characters.
setting.ID can only use letters, numbers, unders: ID can only use letters, numbers, underscores and periods.
setting.You can manage your all devices includin: You can manage your all devices including mobile and desktop.
setting.You can reregister your current device i:
You can reregister your current device if you change your device or if someone is using your Kokkok account
          without your consent.
setting.You will be logged out if you deregsiter: You will be logged out if you deregsiter your current device. You can re-register your device anytime.
setting.Notifications disabled in your device se: Notifications disabled in your device settings.
setting.Please enable the device notifications i: Please enable the device notifications in order to recieve Kok Kok notifications.
setting.When a push notification arrives, it sho: When a push notification arrives, it shows a part of the message.
setting.Price change, trade completion, suggesti: Price change, trade completion, suggestion and keyword alert
setting.You can get notifications by e-mail as w: You can get notifications by e-mail as well
setting.You should register E-mail to get notifi: You should register E-mail to get notifications by e-mail. Please Register E-mail.
setting.Are you sure you want to reset all notif: Are you sure you want to reset all notification settings to default?
setting.You won't see last seen and online statu:
You won't see last seen and online statuses for people
with whom you don't share yours.
setting.Approximate last seen will be shown inst:
Approximate last seen will be shown instead
(recently, within a week, within a month)
setting.You can restrict who can see your profil: You can restrict who can see your profile photo.
setting.You can restrict who can call you by voi: You can restrict who can call you by voice call.
setting.You can restrict who call you by video c: You can restrict who call you by video call.
setting.You can restrict who can add you to grou: You can restrict who can add you to group call.
setting.Kokkok users in your contacts will be au: Kokkok users in your contacts will be automatically synced to you friends list.
setting.When you set up an additional passcode,: When you set up an additional passcode, a lock icon will appear on the chats page.
setting.Tap it to lock and unlock the app: Tap it to lock and unlock the app
setting.If you forget the passcode, you'll need: If you forget the passcode, you'll need to delete and reinstall the app.
setting.You can restrict people who can see and:
You can restrict people who can see and follow your Kok Kok Me by turning On/Off
of Private account.
setting.With private account, only your follower: With private account, only your followers can see your all activities on Kok Kok Me.
setting.People should send you follow requests t: People should send you follow requests to follow you.
setting.Anyone can see your all activities on Ko: Anyone can see your all activities on Kok Kok Me and follow you without your acceptance.
setting.You can manage users who can see your po: You can manage users who can see your posts on Kok Kok Me.
setting.You can manage users who can watch your: You can manage users who can watch your live on Kok Kok Me.
setting.You can manage users who can tag you on: You can manage users who can tag you on their post and live.
setting.Friends excepted cannot see your activit:
Friends excepted cannot see your activities
on Kok Kok Me
setting.Make Followers to enjoy Kok Kok Me: Make Followers to enjoy Kok Kok Me
setting.Follow users to enjoy Kok Kok Me: Follow users to enjoy Kok Kok Me
setting.You can only manage users that all activ:
You can only manage users that all activities are hidden on this page. To hide some users’ activities is
              avavailable on thier Kok Kok Me.
setting.You can restrict who can see your birthd: You can restrict who can see your birthday.
setting.You can restrict what to show your birth: You can restrict what to show your birthday on the profile
setting.1) It does not appear in the friend list: 1) It does not appear in the friend list.
setting.2) Blocked users cannot search for you o: 2) Blocked users cannot search for you or add you as friends.
setting.3) It does not appear in my SNS posts an: 3) It does not appear in my SNS posts and comments
setting.However, you can be invited to group cha: However, you can be invited to group chat, group voice chat, and group video chat.
setting.At this time, the blocked friends mark i: At this time, the blocked friends mark is only shown to you.
setting.Add friends to chat with them: Add friends to chat with them
setting.Automatically apply the display mode(Dar:
Automatically apply the display mode
(Dark/Light) based on system settings.
